Monster Rancher Metropolis Memorial
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Monster Rancher Metropolis Memorial
By Lisa Shock on Sunday, January 21, 2001 - 06:27 pm:

Our forum arose from the ashes of B Campbell's Monster Rancher LUSENET board.
It would not exist without the extensive research & labor on the part of tens of thousands of participants during the previous year.

Special thanks to the thousands of Ranchers who banded together to preserve our data before its destruction by a jealous moderator of a smaller site.
Lisa Shock
April 16, 2000
